PreToolUse.name: prevent-unnecessary-markdown
PreToolUse.description: Prevent creation of unnecessary markdown files
PreToolUse.message:
‚ö†Ô∏è Creating markdown files should be avoided unless explicitly required.

This project already has:
- CLAUDE.md for development guidelines
- README.md for project documentation
- Package-specific READMEs

Only create markdown files if:
1. User explicitly requests documentation
2. Adding critical project documentation
3. Creating specification documents

For other documentation, consider:
- Adding comments in code
- Updating existing markdown files
- Using JSDoc comments

Continue anyway? (y/n)

PostToolUse.name: warn-console-log
PostToolUse.description: Warn about console.log in production code
PostToolUse.command:
if grep -n 'console\.log' {file}; then echo '
‚ö†Ô∏è  Warning: console.log found in {file}. Consider removing for production.'; fi
